search_context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

results.title: Report a missed bin
results.snippet: If your street has been missed but isn't listed as a known disruption, you can report the missed collection using our online form below.

results.title: Tell us about it
results.snippet: Report something to us. This could be things such as child or adult abuse, missed bins, fly-tipping or potholes.

results.snippet: Report a spilled bin if we've spilled any waste when we were emptying your bins.

Recommendations.Title: Report a missed bin
Key Strengths: Direct link to report a missed bin collection
The snippet indicates that the user can report a missed bin collection using an online form
Recommendations.Reasoning: This item directly provides a service that the user is looking for, which is information on how to report a missed bin collection

Recommendations.Title: Disruptions to bin collections

Recommendations.Title: Order a bin

Recommendations.Reasoning: While not addressing a missed bin collection, this link offers a solution for users who may have reported a missing or damaged bin and are awaiting replacement
